metadata.context: ACP vs A2A research for DER predictive maintenance coordination

ai_ethics_frameworks.relevance: High - Research involves AI agents and autonomous communication protocols

frameworks.name: IEEE Standards for Ethical Design of Autonomous Systems
frameworks.focus: Autonomous and intelligent systems ethical considerations
frameworks.relevance_to_research: Direct - ACP/A2A protocols involve autonomous agent decision-making
application_areas: Fair resource allocation in DER coordination

frameworks.name: EU Ethics Guidelines for Trustworthy AI
frameworks.relevance_to_research: High - Establishes framework for AI system ethics
application_areas: Data privacy in energy system monitoring

energy_systems_ethics.relevance: High - Research directly involves energy infrastructure and DER systems

frameworks.name: IEA Energy Ethics Framework
frameworks.focus: Ethical considerations in energy system design
frameworks.relevance_to_research: High - DER coordination affects energy access and security

frameworks.name: Smart Grid Ethics Framework
frameworks.focus: Ethical deployment of smart grid technologies
frameworks.relevance_to_research: High - ACP/A2A protocols are smart grid technologies

data_privacy_frameworks.relevance: High - Research involves data processing and communication protocols

frameworks.name: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
frameworks.focus: Personal data protection and privacy rights
frameworks.relevance_to_research: Medium-High - DER data may include personal information
application_areas: Minimization of personal data in protocols
Data retention policies in coordination systems

frameworks.name: California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
frameworks.focus: Consumer privacy rights and business obligations
frameworks.relevance_to_research: Medium - May apply to DER consumer data
key_principles: Right to know about data collection
Right to opt-out of data sale
application_areas: Consumer control over DER data sharing

research_ethics_frameworks.relevance: High - This is academic research with potential real-world implications

frameworks.name: Helsinki Declaration
frameworks.focus: Ethical principles for research involving human subjects
frameworks.relevance_to_research: Medium - Potential human subjects if user studies conducted
application_areas: Assessment of protocol impacts on users

frameworks.name: IEEE Code of Ethics
frameworks.focus: Professional ethics for engineers and technologists
frameworks.relevance_to_research: High - Technical research with engineering implications
key_principles: Hold paramount public safety and welfare
Perform services in areas of competence
Act for employers/clients as faithful agents
Avoid real or perceived conflicts of interest
application_areas: Public welfare considerations in DER coordination

sustainability_frameworks.relevance: High - Research relates to sustainable energy systems and environmental impact

frameworks.name: UN Sustainable Development Goals
frameworks.relevance_to_research: High - DER coordination supports multiple SDGs

frameworks.name: Precautionary Principle
frameworks.relevance_to_research: Medium - New technologies may have unforeseen impacts
key_principles: Burden of proof on potential harmers
application_areas: Careful assessment of protocol environmental impacts

ai_ethics_frameworks.overall_relevance: High - Research involves AI agents and autonomous communication protocols

framework_assessments.framework: IEEE Standards for Ethical Design of Autonomous Systems
framework_assessments.relevance_to_research: Direct - ACP/A2A protocols involve autonomous agent decision-making
key_considerations: Fair resource allocation in DER coordination
implementation_requirements: Document agent autonomy boundaries and human oversight mechanisms
Ensure transparency in protocol decision-making processes
Establish accountability frameworks for agent actions
Implement fair resource allocation algorithms

framework_assessments.framework: EU Ethics Guidelines for Trustworthy AI
framework_assessments.relevance_to_research: High - Establishes framework for AI system ethics
key_considerations: Data privacy in energy system monitoring
implementation_requirements: Conduct AI impact assessment for protocol implementation
Implement privacy-preserving communication mechanisms
Ensure robust error handling and fallback procedures
Document environmental impact of system operations
Review specific requirements for this framework
Develop implementation checklist
Establish compliance monitoring procedures
